summary: Eligible for both Medicare and Medicaid? In certain states you can get coverage from both programs through “aligned plans,” that is, private plans provided by the same or related companies. This arrangement is intended to better coordinate benefits and care delivery. Some states support the automatic assignment of “dual-eligible” beneficiaries to aligned plans. Finding out more about these beneficiaries’ experiences could help the Centers for...
title: Medicare and Medicaid: Alignment of Managed Care Plans for Dual-Eligible Beneficiaries
